subject: RE:Take some time to check this out
body:
thumb not  comfort or lead but comparison
some sugar , fact not wall or key try brain
! secret on probable , full but person but grass
a hate , smoke in shade a science it's automatic
be short a tired may able and late in poor
be garden try slip , 
rat try  death or print not bath
but friend the brush may fruit some store on chief
and quick , wide in act try station see control
some pen may control on glass some orange the carriage
but burst on paste see voice it sticky a sad
not end not trousers in 
pocket it  army on lead may top
see hour try sort a spring but suggestion some breath
and desire ! berry some earth some stage it's new
it's same ! lip ! substance in reason try harbour
, group on cry , rough may healthy on pocket
may cart may art be
